tasks.summary: Design a modern homepage
Implement user authentication with multi-factor security
Create a robust database schema with optimized queries for improved performance
Develop user registration form with email verification and password strength validation
Set up RESTful API endpoints for user data retrieval and implement data caching for faster response times
Enhance user interface for product listing page with responsive design and interactive features
Integrate secure payment gateway for seamless transactions and fraud detection
Write comprehensive unit tests for core components to ensure code quality and reliability
Optimize database queries for improved performance and reduce server load
Implement user profile page with customizable settings and activity tracking
Add advanced search functionality to the site with filtering and sorting options
Review and refactor frontend code for maintainability and improved code structure
Create admin dashboard with real-time analytics and user management capabilities
Integrate third-party analytics for user insights and behavior tracking
Write comprehensive documentation for API usage and provide examples for developers
Implement shopping cart functionality with discount codes and order tracking
Perform thorough security audit for data protection and vulnerability assessment
Design and implement captivating landing page
Set up automated deployment pipeline for continuous integration and delivery
Conduct user acceptance testing for bug-free experience and feature validation
